title: Shape Of You
lyrics:
[intro] (Am)  (Dm)  (F)  (G)
 
The (Am)club isn't the best place (Dm) to find a lover so the (F)bar is where I go (G)
(Am)Me and my friends at the (Dm)table doing shots, drinking (F)fast and then we talk slow (G)
And you come (Am)over and start up a conver(Dm)sation with just me
And (F)trust me I'll give it a chance (G) now
Take my (Am)hand, stop, put Van the (Dm)Man on the jukebox
And (F)then we start to dance, (G) and now I'm singing like
 
[pre-chorus]
(Am)Girl, you know I (Dm)want your love
(F)Your love was handmade (G)for somebody like (Am)me
Come on now, (Dm)follow my lead
(F)I may be crazy, (G)don't mind me
Say, (Am)boy, let's not (Dm)talk too much
(F)Grab on my waist and (G)put that body on (Am)me
Come on now, (Dm)follow my lead
Come, (F)come on now, follow my (G)lead
 
[chorus]
(Am) I'm in (Dm)love with the shape of (F)you
We push and (G)pull like a magnet (Am)do
Although my (Dm)heart is falling (F)too
I'm in (G)love with your body
(Am) And last (Dm)night you were in my (F)room
And now my (G)bed sheets smell like (Am)you
Every day discove(Dm)ring something brand (F)new
I'm in (G)love with your body
(Am)Oh-I-oh-I-(Dm)oh-I-oh-I (F) I'm in (G)love with your body  x3
(Am) Every day discove(Dm)ring something brand (F)new
I'm in (G)love with the shape of you
 
(Am)One week in we let the (Dm)story begin
We're going (F)out on our first date (G)
You and (Am)me are thrifty, so go (Dm)all you can eat
Fill up your (F)bag and I fill up a plate (G)
We talk for (Am)hours and hours about the (Dm)sweet and the sour
And how your (F)family is doing okay (G)
Leave and (Am)get in a taxi, then (Dm)kiss in the backseat
Tell the (F)driver make the radio play, (G) and I'm singing like
 
[pre-chorus]
(Am)Girl, you know I (Dm)want your love
(F)Your love was handmade (G)for somebody like (Am)me
Come on now, (Dm)follow my lead
(F)I may be crazy, (G)don't mind me
Say, (Am)boy, let's not (Dm)talk too much
(F)Grab on my waist and (G)put that body on (Am)me
Come on now, (Dm)follow my lead
Come, (F)come on now, follow my (G)lead
 
[chorus]
(Am) I'm in (Dm)love with the shape of (F)you
We push and (G)pull like a magnet (Am)do
Although my (Dm)heart is falling (F)too
I'm in (G)love with your body
(Am) And last (Dm)night you were in my (F)room
And now my (G)bed sheets smell like (Am)you
Every day discove(Dm)ring something brand (F)new
I'm in (G)love with your body
(Am)Oh-I-oh-I-(Dm)oh-I-oh-I (F) I'm in (G)love with your body  x3
(Am) Every day discove(Dm)ring something brand (F)new
I'm in (G)love with the shape of you
 
(Am) Come on, be my (Dm)baby, come on, (F) come on, be my (G)baby, come on  x4
 
[chorus]
(Am) I'm in (Dm)love with the shape of (F)you
We push and (G)pull like a magnet (Am)do
Although my (Dm)heart is falling (F)too
I'm in (G)love with your body
(Am) And last (Dm)night you were in my (F)room
And now my (G)bed sheets smell like (Am)you
Every day discove(Dm)ring something brand (F)new
I'm in (G)love with your body
(Am) Come on, be my (Dm)baby, come on, (F) come on, be my (G)baby, come on  x3
(Am) Every day discove(Dm)ring something brand (F)new
I'm in (G)love with the shape of (Am-single strum)you [end]
